job.title: Lead Software Engineer -REMOTE
job.description: We are an online waiver solution for businesses large and small Customized legally binding waivers created with Smartwaiver can be signed online or at your location on a computer tablet or smartphone Signed smart waivers are stored in our secure searchable database eliminating the need for paper waivers and filing cabinetsbrbrWere a small nimble team in Bend OR obsessed with customer service since 2012 Millions of smart waivers are signed each year by organizations like the NFL VANS and the US ArmybrbrWe are looking for a purposeful resultsoriented and capable Engineering Lead to guide and mentor scrum teams with Developers and QA resources who support legacy system maintenance and new application development The ideal candidate will possess a good balance of technology and people management skills leads with empathy and has a keen desire to deeply understand our products and services to push our technology forward for functionality performance reliability and scalability and fully own the delivery of the productbrbrWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Formally mentor guide and develop a highperforming Scrum teamlili Layout technical vision for the team and lead the design for the product while ensuring highquality developmentlili Leverage modern cloudfirst technologies to create efficient and performant processeslili Push the bar to solve complex technical challenges of scale and performancelili Own your teams deliverables and ship highquality maintainable softwarelili Partner effectively and influence peers and senior leadership both within the organizationbrliulWhat You Need for this PositionbrbrBSCS and 5 years of development experience and knowledge ofbrulli Front end technology preferably reactjs and vuejslili NET and PHP and other backend technologieslili Database technologies both RDBMS and NoSQL Preference for MySQL and DynamoDBlili Experience leading and managing a small to a mediumsized team of developers for a minimum of 2 years or someone who has a history of engineering expertise and is ready to assume that next positionlili Demonstrates core competencies of communication and collaboration decisionmaking problemsolving teamwork and initiativelili Experience in building and delivering enterprise software with high availability quality scalability and resiliencelili An advanced understanding of processes and practices which contribute to the reliability maintainability security simplicity performance and testability of softwarelili Demonstrated success in defining and implementing process improvementslili Participate in vendor relationship contract management and implementation planninglili Experienced knowledge of maintaining and debugging live software systems proactively engage in the remediation of software issues related to code or solutions quality security andor patternframeworks and software usability or end userrelated issueslili Deep understanding of issues involved in delivering deploying and supporting an integrated suite of productslili Ability to grasp new areas and adapt to changelili Proficient and minimum 1 years of experience in AWS Cloud Eco Systembrliul Knowledge and experience working in the payments industry preferredbrbrWhats In It for YoubrbrCompetitive base salary 120000140000year and overall compensation packagebrulli Full benefits Medical Dental Visionlili 401 K with generous company matchlili Vacation sick and paid holidayslili Life Insurance coveragebrliulSo if this sounds like yourself wed love to hear from
